summary: This is an affidavit from a Citibank employee in Texas certifying the authenticity of bank records being produced in response to a subpoena. The document references a specific case matter and Citibank reference number, indicating it is part of a legal request for financial records.

persons.name: Legal Support Specialist
persons.role: Citibank employee and custodian of records
persons.context: The affiant who certifies the attached Citibank records are true copies prepared in the ordinary course of business in response to a subpoena.

events.title: Affidavit Execution
events.description: A Citibank employee executes an affidavit in San Antonio, Texas, certifying bank records for a legal matter.

keyFacts: This affidavit certifies Citibank records were produced in response to a subpoena for case matter 'Rent 20191101059'.
The Citibank reference number for the records request is LSI-08192019-326826.
The affidavit was executed on September 3, 2019, in San Antonio, Texas.
The affiant is a Citibank employee and custodian of records who certifies the documents are true copies prepared in the ordinary course of business.
